General.Name: T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited
General.Description: T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited produces and distributes wheat flour in Thailand. The company trades in and imports wheat, wheat products, and other grains. Its products are used in various applications, including bakery and food customers comprising bread, noodles, instant noodles, pizza, pie, donuts, biscuits, steamed buns, deep-fried stick dough, flat breads, biscuit sponge cakes, and cake. The company was formerly known as Thai Sugar Inter Trade Company Limited and changed its name to T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited in 2005. The company was incorporated in 1977 and is based in Phra Pradaeng, Thailand. T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thai Sugar Terminal Public Co., Ltd.
General.Address: 90/9 Moo 1, Soi Siamsilo, Phra Pradaeng, Thailand, 10130
